channel.title: Lighthearted: A Lighthearted Holiday
channel.description:
**Lighthearted: A Lighthearted Holiday** This is a fantasy holiday one-shot of Lighthearted. We'll make characters at the start of the session and the game will be recorded.The holidays are here and over four days your characters will learn the meaning of the celebration of the Four. We'll play to find out how the characters keep their family and friends close and keep The Darkness at bay.We will be using the X-Card, Lines & Veils, as well as Highlights & Heartaches after the session.
**December 20, 2019 6:30 PM PST** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvRQEPxqbHeHxIC9y1N
